reviewText: This is a good basic workout. Covers all the bases and includes some strength training. It's a typical Leslie walking workout with older exercisers. If you could skip past the boring introduction it would be less annoying. She does talk throughout, but that's expected. Overall, a solid workout that is not too difficult and gets the job done.
If you could delete the way-too-long intro & unnecessary promo talk, it would be an ok walk program. I've used it once & may or may not use it again when bored w/ other LS DVD's.
Did this tape at a friend's house.  Was fun and easy to complete.  Look forward to making this exercise a part of my routine.

This DVD is not very good.  Leslie Sansone talks, and talks, and talks.  The music is so low that I cannot hear it.  Because I can't hear the beat and she is talking incessantly, I have a very difficult time keeping in step. It's really not a good buy.
